text: Cronquistianthus leucophyllus is a species of flowering plant in the sunflower family.King, Robert Merrill & Robinson, Harold Ernest. 1972. Phytologia 23(5): 409-412 It is native to Ecuador and Peru.Flann, C (ed) 2009+ Global Compositae Checklist ==References== Category:Cronquistianthus Category:Flora of Ecuador Category:Flora of Peru Category:Near threatened plants
title: Cronquistianthus leucophyllus
